results.title: Simvastatin-Loaded Nanofibrous Membrane Efficiency on the Repair of Achilles Tendons
results.text_hl: Additionally, there is no available research concerning the influence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the healing of acute @<m>DISEASE_Rupture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012421 @@@Achilles tendon rupture@@@.

results.title: Treatment with simvastatin inhibits the formation of abdominal aortic aneurysms in rabbits.
results.text_hl: Immunoreactivity of tissue inhibitor 1 of MMPs was not statistically different among groups II, III, and IV. CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may prove clinically significant in suppressing the development and expansion of @DISEASE_Achalasia_Addisonianism_Alacrimia_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536008 @@@AAAs@@@ and, thereby, in reducing the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Rupture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012421 @@@rupture@@@ and the need for repair.

results.title: Chinese medicine tongxinluo significantly lowers serum lipid levels and stabilizes vulnerable plaques in a rabbit model.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Rupture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012421 @@@plaque rupture@@@ with tongxinluo and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment was significantly lower than that with control treatment (0% for both drug treatments vs. 56.0%; P<0.05).

results.title: Aqueous extract of rhubarb stabilizes vulnerable atherosclerotic plaques due to depression of inflammation and lipid accumulation.
results.text_hl: The results showed that the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Rupture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012421 @@@plaque rupture@@@ in the rhubarb group and the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group was significantly lower than that in the control group (42.86% and 35.71% versus 80.00%, both p < 0.05).

results.title: Suppression of the functionally coupled cyclooxygenase-2/prostaglandin E synthase as a basis of simvastatin-dependent plaque stabilization in humans.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: This study demonstrates that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ decreases @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and inhibits @GENE_COX2 @GENE_4513 @@@COX-2@@@/@GENE_PTGES @GENE_9536 @@@mPGES@@@ expression in plaque macrophages, and this effect in turn may contribute to plaque stabilization by inhibition of MMP-induced @<m>DISEASE_Rupture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012421 @@@plaque rupture@@@.

results.title: HMG CoA reductase inhibitors reduce plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 expression by human vascular smooth muscle and endothelial cells.
results.text_hl: By inhibiting expression of @GENE_SERPINE1 @GENE_5054 @@@PAI-1@@@ from SMCs and ECs while increasing expression of @GENE_PLAT @GENE_5327 @@@tPA@@@ from ECs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may alter the local fibrinolytic balance within the vessel wall toward increased fibrinolytic capacity that, in turn, would reduce @DISEASE_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic@@@ risk after @<m>DISEASE_Rupture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012421 @@@plaque rupture@@@.

citations.NLM: Bourcier T, Libby P. HMG CoA reductase inhibitors reduce plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 expression by human vascular smooth muscle and endothelial cells. Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol. 2000 Feb;20(2):556-62. PMID: 10669656
